```{r scripts, echo=F,message=F,warning=F}
library(ICAMS)

files<-list.files()
files<-files[grep(".vcf",files)]

for(file in c("INDEL")){
  cat<-VCFsToCatalogsAndPlotToPdf(files[grep(file,files)],ref.genome = "GRCh38",region="genome",trans.ranges = trans.ranges.GRCh38,variant.caller = "strelka",output.dir = ".",base.filename = "HEK293T_ID4_CRISPR",return.annotated.vcfs = T)
}

tmp<-cat$catID
tmp[grepl(":4$|:5\\+$",rownames(tmp)),]<-0
PlotCatalogToPdf(tmp,file="HEK293T_ID4_CRISPR.catID_filtered.pdf")

```
